summary: My first companion I have ever made. Nuno is an argonian warrior/tank follower.
descriptionHtml:
Nuno is an argonian warrior/tank follower.
<br />
<br />This is my first skyrim follower mod I have created. His max level is 100 and he starts at level 1, he is a pretty tanky follower later in the game but early game he isnt super strong so hes not overpowered in the start.
<br />He can be found early in the game at [b][u]the Sleeping Giant inn[/u][/b] in [b]Riverwood[/b].
<br />
<br />Enjoy!
author: Fenrikz
